text: Scott Mitchell Putesky (April 28, 1968 - October 22, 2017), more famously known as Daisy Berkowitz, was an American musician. He was the guitarist for Marilyn Manson until 1996. Putesky met Brian Warner at a party in 1989. They started Marilyn Manson & the Spooky Kids. He left the band on May 8, 1996. In March 2013, he joined with THEE PAUSE, to form "The Daisy Kids". ==Death== Putseky was diagnosed with stage-four colorectal cancer in September 2013. He started chemotherapy that month. He died from the disease on October 22, 2017 in San Antonio, Texas at the age of 49.RIP Daisy Berkowitz, founding member of Marilyn Manson (1968-2017): The Moshville Times. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Texas Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:American rock guitarists Category:Musicians from Florida
